alert.note: Alert for Plaquemines; St. Bernard (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 10:00AM CDT until May 06 at 10:30AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... St. Bernard Parish in southeastern Louisiana... North central Plaquemines Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 1030 AM CDT. * At 959 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 14 miles south of Waveland to near Port Sulphur, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Shell Beach. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in New Orleans.
